page.title: 09TINTERN ABBEY
page.content: Tintern Abbey forms the major tourist attraction in the area and is well known for its inspiration to poets,authors and artists. It has stood in its derelict state since the Dissolution of Monasteries in the reign of King Henry V111. Visitors arrive from all over the world and information is available in the major languages. Connected to the Abbey is seasonal work by archaeologists who attempt to excavate further historical remains. During the summer season,tourist information for the whole area is available on the Abbey site. Refreshments and souvenirs are also readily available.
